content: What is the setting for the gmail account in Account Settings, Copies & Folders, for 'Place a copy in' (it should be unchecked), and what is the target folder for drafts (try setting it to Drafts on Local Folders)?
creator: sfhowes

content: Try R. click Inbox > Properties > click 'Repair folder' button. If that doesn't help: does it work in Troubleshoot mode?
creator: siffemoz

content: Again, you serve our community here better by staying with one thread, not starting a new one for each reply. On your issue, I think I understand now. You are wanting the INSERT button on the unified toolbar, but that is not where it needs to be. Please see the two attached screenshots: - one shows the panel for 'account settings' and 'composition & addressing.' On that screen is a text box to check for HTML. Do that. Doing this sets the appropriate menus in the compose panel to show the insert button. - the second screenshot shows the composition panel. The two arrows show two places where you can click when you want to insert an image. Let me know. I want this to work for you. david
creator: davidsk
